Name: Tech Reactor
Description: Enables additional unit construction options and allows 2 units to be created simultaneously.

Root.Tooltip: Insane mercernary technology, only the nuts will use this type of fuel. Allow Infernal Vehicle to activate High-energy Fuel. In this mode, Infernal Vehicle will continuous lose health, but it will burn the nearby enemies dealing 8 (vs. Structure 12) damage and have 30% movement speed boost.
Root.Name: Research High-energy Fuel

Root.Tooltip: Creation of the mercernaries' brutality and madness. Increase the damage of Infernal Vehicle‘s Deflagration Liquid explosion damage by 200%.
Root.Name: Research Unstable Compound

Root.Tooltip: Stolen Dominion Elite Siege Tank Technology. This technology will enable Shadow Blade Siege Tank to cloak itself for a while after it attacked.
Root.Name: Research Shadow Blade System

Root.Tooltip:
雇佣兵一般在群聚庆典上会发射这种极度危险的礼花弹，准许影刃坦克永久使用致命庆典发射致命的礼花弹，在未停止攻击前将逐步提高攻击造成的溅射范围和对重甲单位的额外伤害。
使用狂欢庆典可以立即获得最高层数的溅射范围与对重甲额外伤害，持续10秒。
Root.Name: Research Lethal Celebration

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Allows the **Vulture** to build additional Spider Mines to replace those used.
Root.Name: Research Replenishable Magazine

Root.Tooltip: **Hellions** and **Hellbats** gain +2 armor.
Root.Name: Research Infernal Plating

Root.Tooltip: Increases the blast radius and trigger radius of the Vulture's Spider Mine by 33%.
Root.Name: Research Cerberus Mine

Root.Tooltip: Launches the Hellbat Ranger toward nearby enemy ground units. Briefly stuns enemy units on impact.
Root.Name: Research Jump Jet Assault

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 6.
Root.Name: Research Jump Jet Assault

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 9.
Root.Name: Research Cerberus Mine

Root.Tooltip: Increases the Goliath's anti-air weapon range by 3 and its ground weapon range by 1.
Root.Name: Research Ares-Class Targeting System

Root.Tooltip: Increases the Strike Goliath's anti-air weapon range by 3 and its ground weapon range by 1.
Root.Name: Research Ares-Class Targeting System

Root.Tooltip: Reduces the transformation time of **Siege Tanks**. **Siege Tanks** gain +3 armor in Siege Mode.
Root.Name: Research Advanced Siege Tech

Root.Tooltip: Enables **Siege Tanks** to deploy into Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Siege Tanks have significantly increased range and damage, but they cannot move.
Root.Name: Research Siege Tech

Root.Tooltip: Enables the Concentrated Beam ability and increases the Drakken Laser Drill's attack damage by 10.
Root.Name: Upgrade Laser Drill Level 1

Root.Tooltip: Enables the Pulse Cannon ability and increases the Drakken Laser Drill's attack damage by 20.
Root.Name: Upgrade Laser Drill Level 2

Root.Tooltip: **Goliaths** can target and attack ground and air units simultaneously.
Root.Name: Research Multi-Lock Weapons System

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Widow Mines** to burrow and activate three times as fast.
Root.Name: Research Drilling Claws

Root.Tooltip:
Stuns and disables the detection of mechanical units hit by the Strike Goliath's anti-air attacks for 3 seconds.

Heroic units are immune.
Root.Name: Research Lockdown Missiles

Root.Tooltip:
Night Owl's attack won't deal damage to enemy unit, instead it will stun them for a period of time.

Cannot set structure and hero unit as attack target.
Root.Name: Research Multi-Lock Weapons System

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 6.
Root.Name: Research Lockdown Missiles

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Hellions**, **Hellbats**, **Vikings**, and **Thors** to transform quickly between combat modes.
Root.Name: Research Smart Servos

Root.Tooltip:
Night Owl's attack won't deal damage to enemy unit, instead it will stun them for a period of time.

Cannot set structure and hero unit as attack target.
Root.Name: Research 330mm Barrage Cannon

Root.Tooltip: Increases the attack speed of the first 12 shots of the Cyclone's Lock On.
Root.Name: Research Rapid Fire Launchers

Root.Tooltip: Increases Diamondback attack range by 1.
Root.Name: Tri-Lithium Power Cell

Root.Tooltip: Increases **Cyclone** Lock On damage. Deals 600 damage over 20 seconds to ground targets, and 360 damage over 20 seconds to flying targets.
Root.Name: Research Mag-Field Accelerator

Root.Tooltip:
Night Owl's attack won't deal damage to enemy unit, instead it will stun them for a period of time.

Cannot set structure and hero unit as attack target.
Root.Name: Research Mag-Field Accelerator

Root.Tooltip: Increases the Heavy Siege Tank's attack range by 1 every 3 seconds while in Siege Mode, up to a maximum of 5 additional range.
Root.Name: Research Graduating Range

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 6.
Root.Name: Research Graduating Range

Root.Tooltip: Increases **Cyclone** Lock On range by 3.
Root.Name: Research Targeting Optics

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Heavy Siege Tanks** to deploy Spider Mines, which pursue enemy units that come in range, and detonate for heavy area damage. Buried Spider Mines can only be seen by enemy detectors.
Root.Name: Research Spider Mines

Root.Tooltip: **Siege Tanks** gain +40 attack damage while in Siege Mode. Splash damage remains the same.
Root.Name: Research Maelstrom Rounds

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Thors** to use the 330mm Barrage Cannon ability.
Root.Name: Research 330mm Barrage Cannon

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Behaviors.Tooltip: This structure's fire is being extinguished and is repairing itself to 50% of its maximum life.
This structure's fire is being extinguished and is repairing itself to 50% of its maximum life.
This structure's production speed is increased by -99%.
Behaviors.Name: Chrono Field
